}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Appears to be used in an ''[[Apple]]'' product (OUI 00:1B:63) *''Apple Mac Mini'' (A1283) WLAN/Bluetooth Module [http://electronics360.globalspec.com/article/2176/apple-mac-mini-a1283-teardown teardown] :BCM4321 (BB) + BCM2055 (RF) + BCM2046 (BT 2.1+ERD) :''Skyworks'' SKY65255-12 - WLAN RF PA/FE chip
